name: Maggie's Murder Mystery
description:
Unravel a string of mysteries in an exciting new binge-worthy, “TV Style” episodic Match-3, crime drama: Maggie’s Murder Mystery! Beat fun Match-3 levels and mini-games to solve intriguing crimes in the swinging forties!

Settle in and embark on exciting adventures of Phillies best detective, Maggie McAvery! Along with her bookish grandson Leo, and a fiery assistant Heloise, help Maggie uncover a shocking conspiracy aboard the cruise ship, Charmed Life. Travel to exotic destinations, outwit wicked villains, solve complex crimes, and rediscover old romances in this enthralling crime mystery!


A BINGE WORTHY EPISODIC CRIME STORY WITH A MATCH-3 GAMEPLAY
— Play through “TV Style” episodes and seasons of match-3 levels and mini-games to untangle a twisted conspiracy and unmask an unexpected villain! Experience a brand new dialogue and character heavy, story-driven gameplay as you’ve never experienced before!

MORE THAN A MATCH-3 GAME
— Complete exciting puzzles and discover an enthralling storyline! Investigate crime scenes by looking for hidden objects, comparing crime photos, cross-examining suspects to solve murders and crimes!

BIG CAST OF INTRIGUING CHARACTERS
— Join Maggie, Leo, and Heloise through crime-filled episodes and meet evil geniuses, goofy bystanders, unlucky victims, and intriguing heroes! Follow different story plots and learn what makes these unique characters tick!

EXPLORE THE WORLD
— Travel in a luxurious cruise ship, Charmed Life, to the most beautiful and exotic places around the world - from lavish and extravagant metropolitan cities to the wild and dangerous hidden islands and jungles!

CONSTANTLY UPDATED NEW EPISODES
— Just like in a TV Show, we will constantly release new episodes with each one containing a unique crime story! Our game will turn into your new favorite TV crime series!

A FACEBOOK COMMUNITY OF MYSTERY SEEKERS
— Join our Facebook community to keep up with the news, find new game friends and share your progress! Let’s figure out who is the best murder mystery detective!

No time to wait! Just hit the “Install” button to start your grand adventure!

In case you have any issues, questions or concerns please e-mail us at support@zimad.com.
